name: ANGER
description:
HOW TO PLAY:
Left-Click - Select/Use
Right-Click - Go back to Main Room
F11 - Toggle Fullscreen
ESC - Go back to Title Screen/close game

Try to get your 'Angry' bar as low as possible. If you fill the bar, you will go on an outrage.When on an outrage, you lose more control as time progresses. Eventually, you will have no control, and lose the game. Attempt to calm yourself from an outrage by drinking coffee.a


MINI-GAMES DESCRIPTIONS

TELEVISION:
Hover your mouse ('look') at the TV screen when something appealing comes on, to lower your anger. Look away from the TV when something unappealing is onscreen, or if there is static.

PAINTING:
Cover the wall in a new coat of paint to lower your anger. Do not stare at the old wall's patterns directly, as they can stir some emotions.
